subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
The purpose of this project is to support the Ministry of Investment and the Egyptian Institute of Directors to promote the practice and awareness on corporate social responsibility and the Global Compact. The project will: 
1- Support the establishment and set up of the national center
2- Develop the capacity of the staff at the center and the Ministry on CSR and GC
3- Support the center in availing services for the private sector
subproject.title: National CSR and Global Compac
